jbgenerator.lib

Class JBGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • jbgenerator.lib.JBGenerator

  • public class JBGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the kernel of the library. This class stores informations about the Architect project to write and provides functions to convert a SQL relation to a Java Class

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      Precise how to choose the type of the property representing the imported key.

      • parseXML

        public java.util.List<JBContent> parseXML(java.lang.String filename)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        This method parses the xml file using java xml reader. The 'table' tags are transformed into JBContent objects. 'Relation' tags are used to find relation between tables.
        Parameters:
        filename - The xml file to use.
        Returns:
        a list of JBContent objects.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the parsing fails.
